answers.question: What medical services are covered for people with COVID-19?
answers.answer: All medical services and medicines necessary for the treatment of COVID-19 are covered by the FNUASS for diagnosed persons in Romania. Additionally, medical services are provided in evaluation centers for those with mild to moderate symptoms and at least 2 risk factors, without needing a referral note.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How are long-term symptoms of COVID-19 addressed?
answers.answer: Long-term symptoms of COVID-19 are addressed through the "Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation" service available during day hospitalization. Patients with post-COVID-19 conditions can also benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy, upon recommendation from cardiologists and pneumologists, which are covered by the health insurance system if provided by contracted clinics.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How can patients get devices for breathing support after COVID-19?
answers.answer: Patients with moderate or severe respiratory insufficiency after COVID-19 can benefit from an oxygen concentrator. Patients with certain conditions may also receive noninvasive ventilation. Details on how to obtain these devices are presented in the "Medical devices chapter".
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Medical devices chapter'.
answers.read_instruction: read the section under 'Medical devices chapter'.

answers.question: What kind of initial medical consultations are available for COVID-19 symptoms?
answers.answer: Individuals in Romania showing symptoms of COVID-19 can benefit from remote consultations provided by a family doctor or a specialist doctor.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the page carefully.

answers.question: Where can someone get a COVID-19 vaccine?
answers.answer: In Bucharest, COVID-19 vaccinations can be obtained at family medicine offices. A downloadable list of these offices in Bucharest is available on the website.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.
answers.read_instruction: read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.
